caption.p: Effect of gallic acid on the seedling’s growth of cress and Italian ryegrass: mean ± SE from the two separate experiments with three replications (10 seedlings for each replication) for every experiment that is displayed. Asterisks signify important variations between treatments and control: ** p < 0.01, and *** p < 0.001 (ANOVA one-way and LSD test by post hoc).
